executable.title: Airway Segmentation
executable.description: Semi-automatically extracts the upper airway from a CT image.
executable.contributor: Marc Niethammer, Yi Hong, Johan Andruejol, Cory Quammen

boolean.name: createGeometry
boolean.label: Create output geometry
boolean.description: If enabled, create the airway polygonal geometry.

parameters.label: Segmentation Seeds
parameters.description: Used to automatically leave the lungs out of the segmentation.

point.name: lowerSeed
point.label: Lower seed
point.description: Usually placed at the carina of the trachea, this point is the center of the sphere that helps cut the lungs apart from the airway..

double.name: lowerSeedRadius
double.label: Lower seed's radius
double.description: The radius of the lower seed.

point.name: upperSeed
point.label: Upper seed
point.description: Point placed within the airway. It should be placed in the broadest airway region to help to identify it.

double.name: upperSeedRadius
double.label: Upper seed's radius
double.description: The radius of the upper seed.

parameters.label: Add Airway Fragments
parameters.description: Used to mark disconnected airway fragments that should be included in the segmentation.

boolean.name: bAddAirwayFragments
boolean.label: Add airway fragments
boolean.description: If enabled, add in airway fragments in which the --airwayFragmentSeed arguments reside that are within the intensity range of air.

point.name: airwayFragmentSeeds
point.label: Airway fragment seeds
point.description: Point placed within disconnected airway fragments.

parameters.label: Breathing Mask Removal
parameters.description: Parameters useful for removing breathing masks.

boolean.name: bRemoveBreathingMask
boolean.label: Remove breathing mask
boolean.description: Remove thin objects, such as breathing masks. WARNING: Enabling this option may remove thin structures in the sinus region.

double.name: dBreathingMaskThickness
double.label: Breathing mask thickness
double.description: Thickness of breathing mask or other thin structures to remove.

parameters.label: Tracheal Tube Removal
parameters.description: Seed used to aid algorithm in removing tracheal tube.

boolean.name: bRemoveTrachealTube
boolean.label: Remove tracheal tube
boolean.description: Optionally remove a tracheal tube from the airway. This option requires the --trachealTubeSeed to be set.

point.name: trachealTubeSeed
point.label: Tracheal tube seed
point.description: Point marking a tracheal tube. It should be placed along the length of the tracheal tube.

double.name: trachealTubeSeedRadius
double.label: Tracheal tube seed radius
double.description: The radius of the tracheal tube seed.

double.name: trachealTubeDilationDistance
double.label: Tracheal tube dilation distance
double.description: Distance of the dilation to apply to the segmented tracheal tube object. Increase this if any parts of the trachea tube are not included in the segmentation.

parameters.label: Maxillary Sinus Removal
parameters.description: Advanced settings used to remove the maxillary sinuses.

boolean.name: bRemoveMaxillarySinuses
boolean.label: Remove maxillary sinuses
boolean.description: Choose whether or not to remove the maxillary sinuses.

point.name: maxillarySinusesSeeds
point.label: Maxillary sinuses seeds
point.description: Seed points placed whithin the maxillary sinuses.

double.name: maxillarySinusesSeedsRadius
double.label: Maxillary sinuses seeds radius
double.description: The radius of all the maxillary sinuses seeds.

double.name: erosionPercentage
double.label: Erosion for the maxillary removal
double.description: The percentage of the erodeDistance parameter used during removal of the maxillary sinuses.

parameters.label: Advanced Algorithm Settings
parameters.description: Advanced algorithm settings. Defaults should be good enough for most purposes.

double.name: dMaxAirwayRadius
double.label: Airway maximum radius
double.description: Maximal radius for morphological closing (in mm). Should be set roughly a little larger than the maximum expected radius of the airway.

double.name: dErodeDistance
double.label: Erosion distance
double.description: Erosion distance from estimate of the outer skin layer (in mm) to prevent leaking of the segmetnation out of the nose.

integer.name: iComponent
integer.label: Airway manual label
integer.description: Use this to manually choose the possible airway label. If the value is less than 0, it won't be used.

parameters.label: Advanced Debug Settings
parameters.description: Advanced debug settings. Used only for debugging.

boolean.name: bNoWarning
boolean.label: Break on warning
boolean.description: Choose whether or not to stop executing if a warning is found.

boolean.name: bDebug
boolean.label: Output debug informations
boolean.description: Choose whether to output the debug information and images.

string.name: sDebugFolder
string.label: Destination folder for debug images
string.description: Used only if Debug on. Choose the destination folder of the output debug images.

parameters.label: Algorithm Output Parameters
parameters.description: Simple parameters returned by the algorithm.

double.name: computedThreshold
double.label: Computed threshold
double.description: Threshold automatically determined by the algorithm.

parameters.label: Optional Output
parameters.description: Optional output. These outputs will not be loaded automatically in Slicer

boolean.name: bRAIImage
boolean.label: Write RAI image
boolean.description: Output the image in RAI coordinates. If the input image is not in RAI coordinates, then it will be resampled. This output is the resampled image.

string.name: sRAIImagePath
string.label: Path to RAI image
string.description: Used only if "Write RAI image" is on. Choose the output path of the RAI image: note that a file name is required at the end of the path.
